translations: 悲喜剧；又悲又喜的事情

sentences.sentence: In many areas, this tragicomedy staged continuously.
sentences.translation: 在许多地区，这一悲喜剧不断上演。

sentences.sentence: "Our tragicomedy continues" whispered a waiter in a Havana hotel.
sentences.translation: 我们悲喜剧将会继续“，一个哈瓦那酒店的服务生小声地说。”

sentences.sentence: A lot of time to weave the story of the tragicomedy staged numerous.
sentences.translation: 时间编织了许多的故事，上演了无数的悲喜剧。
